step1.subtext1: Please be a as precise as possible
step1.subtext2: Some basic information about your self, for receipts, contact etc.

personalIdentification.label: Please enter your personal identification no
personalIdentification.validation: Personal Identification no is a required field

firstName.label: Please enter the first name
firstName.validation: First name is a required field

lastName.label: Please enter the last name
lastName.validation: Last name is a required field

streetNumber.label: Please enter the street number
streetNumber.validation: Street number is a required field

postpostOffice.label: (optional) Please enter your post office box number

step2.subtext1: This person will be the administrator of the account.
step2.subtext2: You can add additional users to your company after the registration.

personalWebsite.label: Your main domain on the web
personalWebsite.validation: Personal website is a required field

preferedLanguage.label: This will be the user-interface language and that product input also occurs in the selected language.
preferedLanguage.validation: Prefered language is a required field
